name: Panasonic Alkaline Battery C2, 1.5V
description: Panasonic Alkaline C battery is equipped with Anti-Leak protection. This protects devices from damage due to battery rupture and leakage. These are designed to protect power for up to 10 years when unused and stored properly.Alkaline C batteries have a triple tough coating made of nickel-and-iron alloy. Ideal for remote control cars, toys and musical instruments.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
